Text: Thanks very much!  I have season 1 and was hoping to find more seasons.  Great fun series.

do you have every episode of Maverick? if so i'd do anything for all of the seasons.  im 22 years old and i fell in love watching this show with my dad and papaw.

thanks.

i would like to thank you very much for this season 2 of Maverick i am one of the uploaders of season 1 and have been waiting patiently for our TCM Channel to put more on but they just keep showing season 1 over and over again and at 66 yrs of age my time could be running out who knows so again thank you and i do hope that you keep on putting up the rest as they are very good quality
